description:
The ability to modify a project's manager was added some time ago, and as of https://code.launchpad.net/~rlane/nova/lp701164/+merge/45738, nova-manage supports this as well. 

However, support has not yet been added to the ec2 admin api, so the openstack dashboard is not able to support this.
title: ec2 admin api should support modifying project manager

comments.content:
The ability to modify a project's manager was added some time ago, and as of https://code.launchpad.net/~rlane/nova/lp701164/+merge/45738, nova-manage supports this as well. 

However, support has not yet been added to the ec2 admin api, so the openstack dashboard is not able to support this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~devcamcar
